definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Luo city have door and the high-rise.
sentences.chinese: 例句與用法羅城的四面修有城門，上起高樓。

sentences.english: Presto, sample sentences and usage examples.
sentences.chinese: 轉眼間，就能看到例句和用法示例。

sentences.english: The application of law mainly uses deductive inference or syllogism inference.
sentences.chinese: 法官適用法律中主要運用演繹推理或三段論推理。

sentences.english: Dictionaries are still good for obscure usages and etymologies.
sentences.chinese: 字典依然擅長於不常用的用法和詞源。

sentences.english: To grasp the usage of adjectives and adverbs.
sentences.chinese: 掌握形容詞和副詞的用法。

sentences.english: All these usages line up well with the dictionary definitions I turned up.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些用法和我查閱的字典裏的含義相當一致。

sentences.english: Alum has a lot of uses. This is only one of them.
sentences.chinese: 明礬有許多用法，這只是其中一種。

sentences.english: Contraceptive suppositories are recommended by doctors, as they are easy to use.
sentences.chinese: 建議用避孕栓來避孕，因爲它用法簡單。

sentences.english: You've got mixed up by the use of participle and gerund.
sentences.chinese: 你混淆了現在分詞和動名詞的用法。

sentences.english: There are several students in our class who are still not sure about the use of attributive classes.
sentences.chinese: 我們班上還有好多學生對定語從句的用法仍沒有把握。

sentences.english: I went looking for recent usages of the word crass.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，我查了查單詞crass一些新近的用法。

sentences.english: Setup and usage are straightforward, but there are caveats to consider.
sentences.chinese: 它的設置和用法很簡單，但是仍存在需要考慮的問題。

sentences.english: See the online help for further information for how to use the input panel.
sentences.chinese: 有關輸入面板用法的進一步信息，請參閱聯機幫助。

sentences.english: Dustin Browder: Well obviously each of the races behaves differently with how they use their air units.
sentences.chinese: 可以肯定的是每個種族空軍的用法都不同。

sentences.english: The verb of the Japanese given relation is very complicated.
sentences.chinese: 日語授受關係的動詞用法很複雜。

definition: to use (two words etc) together/to use (sth) continuously
to submit to the law/to obey the law
meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
